name: Extreme Offroad Simulator
description:
Do you feel bored that nothing amazes you anymore? Don't be discouraged!

Extreme Offroad Simulator game comes with a range of interesting missions for you. Your main goal is to demonstrate your skills as a pro-driver.

Your main mission on the game is to drive in a limited time all the checkpoints from the level from the first one to the last one. Because you are in extremely dangerous conditions where even walking is difficult, we need you to prove that it is possible. Get behind the wheel of the vehicles that are made available to you and do your best to get from point A to point B without putting your life in danger and without causing damage.

You will be rewarded honorably, taking into account the risk you assume. It's worth a try for sure!

Game Features :
- Multiple missions
- Extreme conditions
- Limited time
- Speedometer
- Multiple cameras
